channel.title: [VB6] Adding menus and making them do stuff! [For D_Sign]
channel.description:
Hello everyone, im a old vb programmer and i saw d_sign's post about how to add menus and make them put text in a text box etc, so i whipped up a quick tutorial for him! Thank you for reading:
Step !: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/Template.png[/img]
Put a textbox into your vb form, in my example its name is text1
Step 2: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/template2.png[/img]
Right click a space on the form and select Menu editor
Step 3: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/template3.png[/img]
This should pop up, put Insert in for the caption and name, then press next
Step 4: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/template4.png[/img] Put in Hello World for the caption, and hworld for the name, and then press the little arrow [->] and then press ok
Step 5: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/template5.png[/img] You should now see this on your form, click on Insert and then click on Hello World, enter the following code
Step 6: [img]http://xs321.xs.to/xs321/07440/template6.PNG[/img]
Step 7: Run your program and when you click Insert, then hello world, it will add the text 'Hello World' to the textbox!
Simple but needed tutorial, thank you for reading

item.title: [VB6] Adding menus and making them do stuff! [For D_Sign]
item.dc:creator: @Daed Daed
item.description:
@Daed wrote:

Hello everyone, im a old vb programmer and i saw d_sign’s post about how to add menus and make them put text in a text box etc, so i whipped up a quick tutorial for him! Thank you for reading:

Step !:

Put a textbox into your vb form, in my example its name is text1

Step 2:

Right click a space on the form and select Menu editor

Step 3:

This should pop up, put Insert in for the caption and name, then press next

Step 4:

Put in Hello World for the caption, and hworld for the name, and then press the little arrow [->] and then press ok

Step 5:

You should now see this on your form, click on Insert and then click on Hello World, enter the following code

Step 6:

Step 7:
Run your program and when you click Insert, then hello world, it will add the text ‘Hello World’ to the textbox!

Simple but needed tutorial, thank you for reading
